text: hi everyone today is a very quick and
easy recipe for frozen yogurt it's a
very healthy and guilt-free summer treat
that takes less than 5 minutes to make
let's begin
you will need some playing thick and
creamy yogurt just discard the water if
any
some frozen fruits of your choice like
frozen strawberries pie apple grape
papaya melon likey etc you can chop and
freeze them yourself or buy those
packages at a supermarket in Erfurt
processor add in 2 cups of frozen fruits
and 2/3 cup of plain yogurt for that
result a new Greek yogurt because it's
thick and creamy which is perfect for
this recipe then add 2 tbsp of honey or
maple syrup or sugar if you use sugar
make sure you use superfine sugar so
that it can be solved immediately with
their living the grainy texture in our
frozen yogurt later you can adjust the
swing it to your liking and process
until it's become a smooth and creamy
mixture like this that's it you're done
you can serve it like this as a soft
version or freeze it until it gets
firmer and scoop out with an ice cream
scoop finally just garnish with toppings
of your choice you can top up with gummy
bear some nuts chocolate chips or
whatever you like it looks and tastes a
lot like ice cream except that it has a
mole no fat which is good for you this
is the former version after freezing
overnight I top it up with more berries
some raisins and nuts let me give it a
try
mmm really refreshing and creamy it
looks just as good as an ice cream
sundae doesn't it I hope you like it
and thank you for watching bye bye
